derivation.yuyuan_name: 1940s (originally US): imitative of the typical rhythm of this music

entry.tran: 博普爵士乐（亦使用缩略形式 bop）
entry.def: Bebop is a form of jazz music with complex harmonies and rhythms. The abbreviation bop is also used.

means.word_mean: 1. an early form of modern jazz (originating around 1940)
